name: mrmetric
description:
Computes a dissimilarity metric between two images.

Currently only the mean squared difference is fully implemented.

References:
author: David Raffelt (david.raffelt@florey.edu.au) and Max Pietsch (maximilian.pietsch@kcl.ac.uk)

inputs.name: space
inputs.description: voxel (default): per voxel image1: scanner space of image 1 image2: scanner space of image 2 average: scanner space of the average affine transformation of image 1 and 2

inputs.name: interp
inputs.description: set the interpolation method to use when reslicing (choices: nearest, linear, cubic, sinc. Default: linear).

inputs.name: metric
inputs.description: define the dissimilarity metric used to calculate the cost. Choices: diff (squared differences), cc (non-normalised negative cross correlation aka negative cross covariance). Default: diff). cc is only implemented for -space average and -interp linear and cubic.

inputs.name: nonormalisation
inputs.description: do not normalise the dissimilarity metric to the number of voxels.

inputs.name: overlap
inputs.description: output number of voxels that were used.

inputs.name: quiet
inputs.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

inputs.name: force
inputs.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

inputs.name: nthreads
inputs.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

inputs.name: config
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

type.name: config
type.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: help
inputs.description: display this information page and exit.
